title: The Dangers of a One-Sided Story | Guest: Rep. Thomas Massie | 3/3/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the U.S. continuing to buy Russian oil and the dangers of tapping into our strategic oil reserve. Glenn discusses his struggles to find the truth of Ukraine stories with everybody on the same bandwagon. Glenn takes calls from listeners to gauge how they’re feeling in this scary time. Stu discusses the hypocrisy of America's response to Ukraine vs. the response to Hong Kong. Rep. Thomas Massie joins to discuss why he voted against the resolution to back Ukraine. Glenn tells two stories from history to encourage listeners to embrace reason in turbulent times. Stu and Glenn discuss the absurd theory that the Holocaust was linked to Christianity.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
